name: vibe-ai
description: GitHub Repository Vibe Score Calculator - Full-stack application with React frontend and Fastify backend

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.clean:frontend: cd frontend && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json dist
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:env
scripts.setup:env: npm run setup:env:backend && npm run setup:env:frontend
scripts.setup:env:backend: cp backend/env.example backend/.env && echo 'Backend .env file created. Please edit backend/.env with your GitHub token.'
scripts.setup:env:frontend: cp frontend/env.example frontend/.env && echo 'Frontend .env file created. Please edit frontend/.env with your API URL.'

author: Vibe AI Team
